en: Oh, bear. Where are you going?
ca: Oh, ós. Cap a on vas?

en: Oh bear... The machines are destroying it all... I have little hope for us.
ca: Oh ós... Les màquines ho estan destruïnt tot... No em queda ni un bri d'esperança.

en: What? There must be something we can do about it.
ca: Com? Alguna cosa hi hem de poder fer.

en: I'm too old to try and fight it. But take this.
ca: Sóc massa gran per a aquesta lluita. Però agafa això.

en: It will let you keep the ecosystem going.
